forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 57F. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low around 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 49F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.
